4. Place 5 - Chris Coy

Place 5 - Chris Coy
===================

![Chris Coy](https://grapevinetexas.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=3222)Email: [Chris Coy](mailto:ccoy@grapevinetexas.gov)  
 817.689.9899 cell  
 817.481.8974 home  
  
 City Council

* Elected to Place 5 in 2008
* Term expires: 2026

Current Committees

* City Council Utility Committee
* Council Liaison – Building Board of Appeals
* Council Liaison - Parks and Recreation Board
* 4B Economic Development Corporation Board
* DFW Airport Board Liaison
* Crime Control and Prevention District Board
* Tax Increment Financing District Reinvestment Zone No. 1
* Tax Increment Financing District Reinvestment Zone No. 2
* Economic Development Corporation
* Impact Fee Committee

Community Organization Service

* Grapevine Rotary Club, member, past Treasurer and past Board Member
* Grapevine-Colleyville Education Foundation, past Board Member
* Festival volunteer for GrapeFest and Main Street Fest
* Planning & Zoning Commission, past Board member & Vice Chair
* Board of Zoning Adjustments, past Board member & Chair
* Historic Preservation Commission, past Council Liaison
* Library Advisory Board, past Council Liaison
* Leadership Grapevine, graduate
* Grapevine Citizen’s Fire Academy, graduate
* Grapevine Citizen’s Police Academy, graduate
* Boy Scout Troop 7, member, Treasurer, Committee Member and Merit Badge Counselor
* Grapevine Heritage Foundation, member
* Grapevine Historical Society, member
* GCISD Board, past Council Liaison
* City Council Audit Committee, past Board member

Personal

* Grapevine resident since 1989
* Vice President of Finance for Authentix
* Master’s of Business Administration – Southern Methodist University 1989
* Bachelor’s of Business Administration/Finance – University of Texas at Arlington 1988
* Eagle Scout
* Married to Traci Coy
* Three children - All GCISD graduates

* [Online  
  Payments](https://grapevinetexas.gov/386/epay.aspx)

* [Employment](https://agency.governmentjobs.com/grapevinetx/default.cfm)

* [Solid Waste  
  & Recycling](https://grapevinetexas.gov/795)

* [Meeting VideoS](https://grapevinetexas.gov/1059/Agendas-Minutes)

  An Issue](https://grapevinetexas.gov/389)

* [Media](https://grapevinetexas.gov/1417)
